metadata.title: CVE-2018-1002209 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
QuaZIP before 0.7.6 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowing attackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Zip archive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability is also known as 'Zip-Slip'.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-1002209` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libquazip5-1 - 0.7.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libquazip package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.6-1').
